resources.string: Type the name of the music file:

Music Shake application uses the accelerometer to produce music. You can shake your android phone or device and compose music. Keep your phone on your hand. Be careful not to drop it when you shake it. Shake in different directions as shown in the figure below and enjoy the sound of the guitar.
Music Shake application uses the accelerometer to produce music. You can shake your android phone or device and compose music. Keep your phone on your hand.
Be careful not to drop it when you shake it. Shake in different directions as shown in the figure below and enjoy the sound of the guitar.
Click here to choose the language you want.
